name: Spear, totem
description: The spear's relatively wide head alows it to be used as a slahing weapon, swung side to side, or as a piercing weaon in a more traditiona spear-fighting technique.
benefit: If the user is trained in the spear's use, a totem spear can be used by bards to create bardic music effects using Perform (wind instrument). The spear itself has a strong, flexible shaft, and in the hands of one trained in its use, grants a +2 circumstance bonus on Acrobatics checks.
